{
    "sql": "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS t0; CREATE TABLE t0(c0 INT); INSERT INTO t0 VALUES (1); SELECT c0 FROM t0 WHERE POW(0, -1); SHOW WARNINGS;",
    "Affected Elements": "SHOW WARNINGS, POW function",
    "Root Cause Analysis": "SHOW WARNINGS does not capture the error generated by the POW function when it encounters invalid input."
}
